name: Anonymous (fantazehiro)
description:
Anonymous is a game that player will become hacker, who has skills to crack many different codes to get some bitcoins. Hacker is very cautious about going outside because of the police, so he only stays in his room. Hacker is pleased with the bitcoins that he could spend in the Black market and the Game room. Numerous puzzles require hackers to practice enough to crack them. In this game, you will need to be aware of the security wall to stay safe without being busted by the police. You will challenge your brain and your skills in many different ways while playing this game. Nothing is fun without challenges.

This game is a prototype, so some bugs and some puzzles are not completed yet. 

Developed by Hao Vu - Game designer, artist, programmer - https://www.behance.net/fantazero

Made in Unity
